website_summaries.verdict: Although the confetti show doesn't last long, it's entertaining for kids, as they also enjoy this kit's doll and surprises.
pros: Exciting for kids when they open it and the confetti flies
Contains nine surprises and one of 35+ dolls from series 3
cons: A few customers received balls with missing or broken pieces

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think twice and don’t waste anymore time and stress
customer_reviews.text: To all the parents stalking 97 targets in a day this is the real deal. They are authentic. And we opened two out of 4 we purchased and both were golds!!! Don’t think twice and don’t waste anymore time and stress.....
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Definitely real! These are the new wave 2! My girls were so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Bryan

customer_reviews.title: REAL AND AUTHENTIC! NEW WAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to have these be the new wave!!!! My daughter got the SPFQT that she really wanted!
customer_reviews.author: breanna

customer_reviews.title: My daughters LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can get my girls the toy that they spend all their time talking about. Literally 90% of their day is spent talking about LOL dolls. Does anyone else feel my pain? I did feel like a supermom when I got them these Series 3, Wave 2, REAL LOL Confetti Pop LOL balls. Why they do not keep them in stock in stores is mind boggling, I suppose to keep demand up? Glad that they are available here.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Boots

customer_reviews.title: So happy I took a chance
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy to have received wave 2 instead of 1! We got Pharaoh babe and a gold ball and it was the twins! My daughter was so happy and I was too because there is a lot of fake wave 2s on Amazon but this is the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Fake fake fake
customer_reviews.text: Definitely got a fake. It was a duplicate of one we already had (no big deal) but it was clearly not made the same way. The bathing suit wasn’t metallic - it wasn’t even made of the same material. The body looks different, and was made of a different material. The packaging was odd, and it didn’t include all of her accessories. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Corey V

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very disappointed with this product. The paint was peeling and it did not look like other LOL dolls we had purchased. The item also was a 2 day delivery showing as prime and it took over a week to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is only one doll - Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I purchase dozens of items each month on Amazon but rarely feel the need to do a negative review. However, I believe others need to be aware. I purchased this for my daughter on her 6th birthday. She was excited to get three ( $23 because I thought I was getting 3) but there was only one in the ball. It should have been made clear that there would be one doll as the cost was far higher than the others and the long description, misleading. Now I have to get two more because I promised her three but will not be getting from the same seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and none of them were a like. Sadly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three of these, and none of them were a like. Sadly, didn't find the one I was looking for which was Unicorn but I've got some great dolls for a project I plan on working on soon! The three I found in the balls I bought were as follows: Pharaoh Babe Babydoll Flower Child I do wish the outfits were made a little different, it was a struggle to get Pharaoh Babe's bottoms on. I'd totally buy these again for a chance to hopefully get Unicorn.
customer_reviews.author: LPTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: I HAD READ THE GOOD COMMENTS OF GETTING GOLD BALLS FROM AMAZOM
customer_reviews.text: I HAD READ THE GOOD COMMENTS OF GETTING GOLD BALLS FROM AMAZOM. I HAD BOUGHT ONLINE FROM OTHER PEOPLE AND NEVER GOT GOLD BALLS. MY DAUGHTER WANTED ONE. I HAD EXPLAINED HER THAT SOME PEOPLE CHECK THE BALLS AND PICKED THE GOLD ONES AND SELL THE OTHER ONES. I WASN'T EXPECTING TOO MUCH TO GET A GOLD ONE. I BOUGHT 3 FROM AMAZON, AND FOR MY SURPRISE WE GET A GOLD ONE AND WAS PUNK BOI!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: narda

customer_reviews.title: Wave 2 Ultra rare dolls! Punk Boi!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 for my daughter and they are the wave 2 of series 3 we got 3 ultra rare dolls including punk boi! She was so excited, get them while you can this is definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Manufacture defect
customer_reviews.text: A little bummed doll came with one shoe. A pricey little doll with one shoe 😏.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: ONLY COMES WITH ONE DOLL
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The ad is misleading stating 3 dolls for $23.99. It was only one doll as the standard LOL packaging goes which run $9.99. Complete rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Original price was good. Wouldn't order one for 23.00 though
customer_reviews.text: Update: I paid like 11.99 for these now the price is double. I'm happy with my purchase still but would never pay 23.00 dollars for one. Let me start by saying I'm very happy to have been able to buy these off of Amazon without getting ripped off like some of the lol doll sellers that charge almost double the regular price. I don't mind paying the extra dollar or 2. I purchased 2 and my daughter got a gold ball (kind of rare) from one of them which she was very excited about. Will probably buy more again as long as the price doesn't go up.
customer_reviews.author: ryan tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My kids love these dolls. It has compartments on the top of the ball for the kid to open with the surprises in it . Once those are open you pull a string that's in one of the compartments. The ball pops open and confetti flies out including the remaining surprises. These are alot of fun for kids. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lasiter

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after searching at the 99cents store and these were way nicer! The glitter does get everywhere but they looked great for the wine bottles I gifted my office staff. Only gave it 4 stars because the bags were very stiff and the glue wasn't going to hold in some places for much longer. But still would buy these again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Salas

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter as a gift, not really knowing what I was buying. She just said she wanted a Confetti Pop LOL. I found out that I could get these for about $15 and I paid $38. Since I didn't know what I was really buying I didn't realize it was overpriced. Item is what she wanted. VERY Difficult to unpack - this was my first and last purchase of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: In general, I think L.O.L. dolls are overpriced and overrated, but this one was especially a rip off. I have a Master's Plus 45 and still struggled with opening it correctly for the confetti to come out as it is supposed to. The confetti was simply paper circles-complete waste of money in my mind. The regular L.O.L. dolls are cheaper and less messy.
customer_reviews.author: JBalser

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it I didn't love the mess
customer_reviews.text: These are real LOL dolls, so if that is what you are looking for then you're good. My daughter opened it up and was so happy! Took her a while to get the package opened but when she did and unleashed the confetti it made a mess all over my carpet. Her smile and laughter was worth it though. She accidentally dropped some of the smaller items on the floor but that was our mistake we lost a couple of items.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores C.

customer_reviews.title: love these things
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun and my kids get such enjoyment opening each layer. They then build cities for the little dolls in our house utilizing other toys we own. I was impressed how well these work for imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggeruth

customer_reviews.title: Made for UK distribution
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see these become available again. The reviews were mixed but I took my chances. I immediately noticed when I opened it today that the packaging was slightly different and the label clearly says made for UK. Not USA. Also, lable isn’t only in English. Inside though the doll seems to be of the same quality that I’m used to and it’s one that we didn’t have so I’ve very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pham

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF Duplicates
customer_reviews.text: LOL are such great dolls there so cute but a lot of duplicates come with these confetti pop ! I have learned sometimes it's more affordable to buy the doll u are looking for rather than Tons of duplicates! If your interested I have tons of duplicates and sealed for way less on eBay and my name is seller: nikkimoore21 just type in search box :)
customer_reviews.author: trstnikki

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. I am told some of these could be counterfeit but ours came Fulfilled by Amazon and seem to be legit. No screws in the back or anything that looks off from here many other dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Pitstop

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and over priced
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old had fun unwrapping the doll. But the doll is cheap and seems like something you get from a gum ball machine. Not worth the money to me.
customer_reviews.author: BrickHaus

customer_reviews.title: These aren't real
customer_reviews.text: Def disappointed got two lil bitty dolls in one ball but no clothes and shoes don't fit even two of the spin turn around things didn't have anything in them. Def fooled me don't buy this these other reviews must be fake that say they are so real blah blah save your money my child is very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Girls Love them but SO MUCH PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: My eco-friendly side just cringes buying these because MY GOODNESS there is so much plastic waste! I mean it's really seriously ridiculous how much you just throw away with this product. But of course my daughters think they are the greatest thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Overrated!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very overrated, I was so surprised to see the contents of this specially for the amount of money that we pay for it. I only got it because my Granddaughter was wanting it, I will not be buying any more of the LOL packages, they are totally not worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: Elsa G. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Fake, cheap, don’t waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: First one was real. Second one was not, paint was chipping off as we opened it and the items were permanently squished.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas, not really knowing what I was buying. She just said she wanted a Confetti Pop LOL, after Christmas I found out that I could get these for about $15 and I paid $38. Since I didn't know what I was really buying I didn't realize it was overpriced. Item is good though, exactly what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: jodib214

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the confetti pop surprise doll. When she finally ripped off the outer plastic wrap, a compartment was missing from the top. I knew we’d were in trouble. The item did pop confetti, however, the only surprises were two min lol little sisters. They were both so small they fit into the mini laundry basket included. There were no shoes, no water bottles, no sunglasses, and no clothes. When checking the included lists the dolls were not even pictured. She was very disappointed. My thinking is that this seller was dealing with counterfeit L.O.L. Dolls. How disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Pop was more like a sad whimper...
customer_reviews.text: Uggg my kid wanted this forever. Good thing it contained a good doll because the confetti pop portion was a dud. Poor kid dropped it on the floor while unzipping, it split in 2, and 6 pieces of confetti sadly scattered on the floor. Major disappointment, but cute doll.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for a lil girls bday present.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and great price. I bought this for my 7 gear old daughter because it was the only thing she asked for, for her 7th bday party this past Saturday! She really very much adored this and the contents were super cute. There are small parts though so keep that in mind if you have young children or pets who Chew small things.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus420

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandbaby who turned 6 yrs old yesterday. She does not live with me so I can't tell you anything about it except that she love L.O.L.s, asked for the L.O.L. Confetti for her birthday and I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Real LOLZ!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I’ve been trying to find a real lol doll from this wave, THEY ARE REAL!!! Yay! I got showbaby, absolutely adorable. I ordered 2 more. 😁🍬🔥
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOL may have been pre-opened and switched out
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this LOL for Christmas. When she opened the LOL ball, the dool was not properly matched with the accessories, clues, etc. In my opinion, it appears that the correct doll was switched out. The were also a lot of sticker type things on the outside indicating that it may have been resealed. We were disappointed. I would not buy from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sans

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, girls love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toys that all the girls are into right now. My daughter's had to have it and since I couldn't find them at the stores, I was happy that Amazon carried them. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: The kids love these
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old granddaughter requested a confetti pop LOL and, of course, being a loving and indulging grandma, I bought one for her. She loved it. I am not fond of the toy myself but the little ones do appear to enjoy them. Especially they love the anticipation as they work their way into the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Swan

customer_reviews.title: so popular and so not worth it BUT ....
customer_reviews.text: These are so popular with little girls but are soooooo over priced for what you get - cheap, cheap, cheap stuff at a premium price BUT, the little princess is happy so all is good - who ever created the marketing for these things, Congratulations!
customer_reviews.author: cameliaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was expected
customer_reviews.text: A lot of these reviews mention the cheap nature of the toys. Yes, they're cheaply fit clothes and dolls for their price. However, the kid who is playing with it thinks it is perfect. These are the official toys that create WAY too much trash but my daughter thinks it is amazing. So, it is exactly what it is advertised to be.
customer_reviews.author: Militum

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sister really like it but for the price it’s too expensive. Price is just too high.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These LOL Surprise dolls are 100% authentic! They are worth the money especially where amazon has them for the cheapest price right now. these are hard to find!. Not to mention if you have prime you get them in 2 days!! The dolls are so cute and so well made. I will be purchasing more on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Doherty

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My little niece loved the one that I gave her! I must admit that I didn't mind sitting with her to help pull back each layer to find the clues. Yes, the confetti is a little messy, but it's too much fun to let that be a bother! I'll be ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very happy and told me that it was the real one!.. The girls know!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were real
customer_reviews.text: It’s always a gamble on amazon. But these were real and she got 2 different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K Drago

customer_reviews.title: My little girl loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive but the kids love them! They’re fun to open (even as a grown woman) and I love these adorable, stylish dolls. A lot of work and concept goes into their creation.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: LOL Surprise Confetti Pop-Series 3
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my granddaughter as a birthday gift, but arrived too late to be included in her gift. No problem though, it will be part of her December holiday gift. She loves the LOL collectables! I'm glad it finally arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Apfel

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken 😭
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter birthday it was sent loose in the box with other items and was broken so it didn’t pop the confetti cause the spin was broken
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with an LOL doll for little girls.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition and on time. My granddaughter loves anything LOL and she loved this doll too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: They make her happier than I ever could on my own
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They make her happier than I ever could on my own. I do not understand the excitement of unwrapping 47 layers of cellophane in order to receive a small doll, but she does. So five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal! We were so excited! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Fun
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these things, a little pricey for what you get and it's a mess to clean up but the joy she gets makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri M. Barber, RN

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: These are a very expensive line of the lol dolls, but a really neat and exciting toy to open. The dolls are well made and my daughter is happy so it's worth the slightly higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L

customer_reviews.title: 4 and 5 year old nieces loved it
customer_reviews.text: Although have no idea what the fuss is about, my nieces shrieked with joy when they got it. It’s basically tons of layers of plastic that get removed until you get some little plastic toys.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment for the price tag
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed for the $36 price tag. I usually buy lots of LOL dolls. We expected something bigger with more toys or dolls inside. The only difference from your basic LOL doll was some paper confetti inside the case. A huge waste of money. Highly dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ioannina9

customer_reviews.title: Rare
customer_reviews.text: I am a grandma who got this for my granddaughter's 8th birthday. Apparently this particular one is considered rare by the girls and their friends. Who knew? A happy accident.... :)
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money - It should be from a gumball machine.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I paid 27 dollars for a little plastic doll with cheap plastic parts that are so little that they get lost easily. This toy is such a waste of money. It is worth about 25 cents.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Anita O.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand these toys, but my daughter loves them. So...5 stars for doing what the commercial said it did :-) Beware for the confetti that explodes out as you open it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Leifker

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: A top thing on my niece’s Christmas list so I’m glad I could grab one, can’t wait to give her her gift
customer_reviews.author: pokesfan75

customer_reviews.title: Crap.
customer_reviews.text: Have to edit my review. Initial unboxing was jarring with obvious glue on face, poorer quality plastic used then previous season as its too soft and smells, paint smear from lashline. Thought this was a fake just by horribly put together it is to find out it is a real color changer and it's just manufacturing that is godawful! Apologies to seller, not your fault, I am just disgusted with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RowanCSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my niece for her birthday. I don't know anything about these and they seemed to be a little expensive but it was worth the money and more just to watch her unwrap it
customer_reviews.author: David Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Daughter is disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter was very disappointed on Christmas Day because the Lol dolls face was mashed and it will not go back to normal. She want even play with it and it was the unicorn Lol, she has been waiting for that one.
customer_reviews.author: lonnie dulaney

customer_reviews.title: Cost too much
customer_reviews.text: This surprise confetti doll isn’t worth the money. The $10 LOL dolls are the same thing only without confetti.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Something disgusting was on the outside of the ball...
customer_reviews.text: When the Amazon shipping box arrived, there was a noticeable odor about it. I opened it up, and the ball was covered in some kind of sticky light yellow substance. I actually had to wash the wrapping off because this arrived in such a disgusting manner. It smelled like strong garlic and another scent I really couldn't figure out, but it was nasty. If my daughter didn't have to wait over 6 days to receive this item, it would have gone straight back as it arrived!
customer_reviews.author: shilux

customer_reviews.title: Actuall lol dolls not fakes
customer_reviews.text: Received the same doll every time I order an lol not sure if it's just my luck but I ordered several for Xmas last year and my mom ordered some to we got 3 of the same one out of 5
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth

customer_reviews.title: Party inside a ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece. She was super excited to see what was inside. I did not realize there was a party inside. When she opened it, confetti popped out. I still don't understand all the hype about this toy, but my niece loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbley Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Way too expensive but daughter has been wanting one from this series so I guess it's worth her excitement.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea

customer_reviews.title: Confetti Pop was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter loves LOLdolls and had been asking for a confetti pop one. I searched everywhere in our town for one and no luck. Finally found at amazon! She was so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: You ripped me off
customer_reviews.text: This is so disappointing! I also purchased this thinking that it was 2 dolls, therefore 20 bucks was worth it for 2 dolls. This is outrageous and misleading the headers clearly indicates 2 collectable dolls. I want my other doll now.
customer_reviews.author: Jamila Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Love LOL's
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. Description not very accurate. Made it seem as if you were getting 2 balls when you actually only receive 1 ball
customer_reviews.author: Casey Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Disrespected
customer_reviews.text: I feel highly disrespected and took advantage of.. why do y’all make it seem like this has 3 dolls in it?? I don’t get why this one is $32 and the others are $12. My niece better love this on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My four year old favorite one
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter is so happy with this lol doll. She really loves to pop the confetti over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Marcum

customer_reviews.title: The real deal and we even got an ultra rare
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said she got pretty awesome ones including a boy. We ordered three and they were all different. I don’t know much about these but she loves them. The cats in the picture came from the Lost Kitties five pack we also ordered from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: K. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best LOL surprise toy!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could afford to buy like 15 of these. They're so much fun. I've gotten a few LOL surprise toys but this one was the best. It fires out confetti and my toddler was in love!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: amazing! My child was so happy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, amazing! My child was so happy... she take it to every where... than you! Inclited 1 doll in big ball of plastic... and many little thinks for thid doll inside.
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am not really a fan of all the "wrappings mess" these make, and I don't like knowing whether my daughter will get a doll immodestly dressed or not, but my daughter sure likes these things.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for small gifts. Kids seem to like them real well & the price is good!
customer_reviews.author: Frances L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter who is obsessed with LOL dolls, she earned it off her sticker chart...and once she opened she got the wrong doll with the wrong outfit that’s suppose to go with her doll. She was very disappointed and upset. Won’t order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy kid
customer_reviews.text: bought for kid who wants it. beware real vs fake out online market. we were all right.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: LOL Surprise Confetti Pop (Series 3)
customer_reviews.text: Real and original LOL Surprise doll + I got one of my favorites! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Stoney Clover

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old is in love with these fools the product delivered as advertised she ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is in love with these fools the product delivered as advertised she loves opening all the little pars and dressing the dolls
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Authentic! Good purchase, too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love this series. Wish it wasn't $30 a pop, i bought it for my daughter for Xmas and she loved it. Very fun to open, more than the other series, and the dolls and too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nani26

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved these
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 6 year old daughter. who has way too many already but she loves what she loves. I received original ones and as I had anticipated they did not disappoint she was a happy girl
customer_reviews.author: vron

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Do your homework!
customer_reviews.text: As expected but didn't do my homework ahead of time to know I was paying double the price of what it would have cost in a store....ughhh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im a awesome uncle
customer_reviews.text: Way to dang expensive for the toy this is. But my niece loves them. Everything seems to be in good form so it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. When child try to open fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A complete rip off.
customer_reviews.text: I was completely robbed over this purchase. There was nothing exceptional about this item. I was under the misconception that it was a large LOL surprise toy. I paid $26 dollars more for this toy than what it's worth in store for the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality paint and wobbly head; eyelashes weren’t painted. Submitted claim to manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: dumbest toy ever. Kids love unwrapping things so this product exploits that. Toy inside is worth $.25
customer_reviews.author: Apple User

customer_reviews.title: For my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Personally I think these things are a waist of money however it was well spent to see the joy on my granddaughters face as she opened up her gift.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and Small
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the item looks much larger than the actual item. The actual size is that of a softball. My grand-daughter loves it but wow, for what you receive, it is very over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome, made my sweet daughter the happiest kid alive!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Such a ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I paid about $20 for this. Such a small product and really not worth the hype (in my opinion). My niece did find it amusing for a few minutes though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Burwood

customer_reviews.title: Confetti do not work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one paying 3 times regular price of a lol, but confetti does not work, or was not working in the unit Amazon sent me (pull string did not work).
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Party in a ball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these balls. And we saved the confetti for her party tables .
customer_reviews.author: Blessedbygrace

customer_reviews.title: Cute dolls
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter. She loves it. Doll was too cute! A bit pricey but it was a great gift
customer_reviews.author: kam56

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it to see the smiles they brought
customer_reviews.text: New dolls my granddaughters didn't have. They were so excited. So fun for them to open.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: LOL surprises are great for young girls
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves all of LOL products I will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gunderman

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake or defective but my daughter still plays with it hence the 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: myransom

customer_reviews.title: Lol surprise it’s real!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! Hundred percent authentic! My daughter was in love. Save me the trouble of waiting in a line or searching in multiple stores for.
customer_reviews.author: Jia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: New!
customer_reviews.text: Anxious to see my grand-daughters face on her BD enjoying this latest craze!
customer_reviews.author: E. S. M.

product_meta.title: L.O.L. Surprise Confetti Pop- Series 3-1
product_meta.description:
Color:StandartIn a world where babies run everything, little rockers rebel against nap time and teacher's pets become class presidents with "Free Pizza Fridays!" In this world, all work is play and nothing is dull cuz it's all a lil' surprising and outrageous! 

L.O.L. Surprise! Confetti Pop is a surprise party in every ball. Discover 9 surprises inside, which surprise will you unbox next? Shoes, outfit, doll? It's a mystery! When you find the ribbon, pull for a confetti, pop, surprise! Unbox L.O.L. Surprise! Confetti Pop again and again!
feature_bullets: Includes (1) Secret Message Sticker (2) Collectible Stickers (3) Bottle Charm (4) Shoes (5) Outfit (6) Accessory (7) Ring Tattoo for you (8) Confetti Pop (9) L.O.L. Surprise; Doll with water surprise
Feed your L.O.L. Surprise Doll with the water bottle and discover brand new water surprises
You can un box Confetti Pop ball surprises again, and again
35 plus all new dolls to collect in Series 3 Includes cross sell poster
